page.description: Define the external page to embed in the UX Component.

discussion.p: The *[ui:External URL Properties]* defines the URL for the content to embed in the component. This option is only available when the Embedded Object Properties [Object type] is set to "External page".
For embedded static HTML page options, see [HTML Document Properties].

description.p: The page URL to embed. This URL can be a URL to other pages on your website.

link.link: ux control properties embedded object properties object type
